title: Salvation's Dawn
description: The War was over, the Devil Queen cast down...In the wake of the Apocalypse, veteran demonhunter Karian Vanador understands that the vigilance of her Order leaves little time for leisure. Even as one paragon of darkness is cast down, Kari knows it won't be long before another rears its head.For the Order, after all, the War never ends.With demons threatening invasion once more, Kari soon finds herself lunging headfirst into danger again. It is the life she's chosen, the only path she really knows. She fights with savage passion, defending her convictions despite the varied trials awaiting her there in the dark. Tests of friendship. The fires of love. The heat of battle. Even the limits of her own faith. Through these, though, Kari will seek the answer to a question that has ripped at her mind for eight long years:"Why was I resurrected?"
author: Joe     Jackson
